languages.text: "С тела — установив личность убитого, мы сможем изучить его окружение и сузить круг подозреваемых. Осмотром тела занимается капитан Кляйн".
"The body. Once we have ascertained the dead man's identity, we'll be able to locate his associates and narrow down the number of suspects. Captain Klein is in charge of examining the corpse."
languages.original_text: "С тела — установив личность убитого, мы сможем изучить его окружение и сузить круг подозреваемых. Осмотром тела занимается капитан Кляйн".

traits.locale_text: "The body. Once we have ascertained the dead man's identity, we can find out about his associates and narrow down the number of suspects. Officer Klein is in charge of examining the body."
"The body. Once we have ascertained the dead man's identity, we can find out about his associates and narrow down the number of suspects. Officer Klein is in charge of examining the body."
"The body. Once we have ascertained the dead man's identity, we'll be able to locate his associates and narrow down the number of suspects. Officer Klein is in charge of examining the corpse."
"The body. Once we have ascertained the dead man's identity, we'll be able to locate his associates and narrow down the number of suspects. Officer Klein is in charge of examining the corpse."
"The body. Once we have ascertained the dead man's identity, we'll be able to locate his associates and narrow down the number of suspects. Captain Klein is in charge of examining the corpse."
"The body. Once we have ascertained the dead man's identity, we'll be able to locate his associates and narrow down the number of suspects. Captain Klein is in charge of examining the corpse."

languages.text: « Par la victime. Dès que nous l'aurons identifiée, nous saurons où trouver ses associés et cela réduira d'autant le nombre de suspects. C'est le capitaine Klein qui est chargé d'examiner le corps. »
languages.original_text: "The body. Once we have ascertained the dead man's identity, we'll be able to locate his associates and narrow down the number of suspects. Captain Klein is in charge of examining the corpse."

traits.locale_text: « Par la victime. Dès que nous l'aurons identifiée, nous saurons où trouver ses associés et cela réduira d'autant le nombre de suspects. C'est l'officier Klein qui est chargé d'examiner le corps. »

languages.text: «El cadáver. Cuando hayamos confirmado la identidad del fallecido, podremos localizar a sus conocidos y limitar la lista de sospechosos. El capitán Klein está a cargo de examinar el cuerpo».
languages.original_text: "The body. Once we have ascertained the dead man's identity, we'll be able to locate his associates and narrow down the number of suspects. Captain Klein is in charge of examining the corpse."

traits.locale_text: «El cadáver. Cuando hayamos confirmado la identidad del fallecido, podremos localizar a sus conocidos y limitar la lista de sospechosos. El oficial Klein está a cargo de examinar el cuerpo».

languages.text: “先调查尸体。只要能确认死者的身份，我们就能找到他的小圈子，缩小嫌疑人的范围。负责检查尸体的人是克莱因上尉。”
languages.original_text: "The body. Once we have ascertained the dead man's identity, we'll be able to locate his associates and narrow down the number of suspects. Captain Klein is in charge of examining the corpse."

traits.locale_text: “先调查尸体。只要能确认死者的身份，我们就能找到他的小圈子，缩小嫌疑人的范围。负责检查尸体的人是克莱因军官。”

languages.text: 「遺体。身元が特定できた後、協力者を探し出し、容疑者を絞り込むことができるでしょう。クライン中隊長が遺体の検視を担当します」
languages.original_text: "The body. Once we have ascertained the dead man's identity, we'll be able to locate his associates and narrow down the number of suspects. Captain Klein is in charge of examining the corpse."

traits.locale_text: 「遺体。身元が特定できた後、協力者を探し出し、容疑者を絞り込むことができるでしょう。クライン巡査が遺体の検視を担当します」

languages.text: "Die Leiche. Wenn wir die Identität des Toten geklärt haben, können wir seine Kontakte aufspüren und den Kreis der Verdächtigen eingrenzen. Captain Klein ist für die Untersuchung der Leiche zuständig."
languages.original_text: "The body. Once we have ascertained the dead man's identity, we'll be able to locate his associates and narrow down the number of suspects. Captain Klein is in charge of examining the corpse."

traits.locale_text: "Die Leiche. Wenn wir die Identität des Toten geklärt haben, können wir seine Kontakte aufspüren und den Kreis der Verdächtigen eingrenzen. Offizier Klein ist für die Untersuchung der Leiche zuständig."

languages.text: "Cesetten başlayalım. Ölü adamın kimliğini doğruladığımızda iş ortaklarının nerede bulunduğunu tespit edip şüpheli sayısını azaltabiliriz. Cesedi incelemeden Komutan Klein sorumlu."
languages.original_text: "The body. Once we have ascertained the dead man's identity, we'll be able to locate his associates and narrow down the number of suspects. Captain Klein is in charge of examining the corpse."
